languages.text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Успешно применив {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удар щитом{/g}, персонаж восстанавливает 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. При движении до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} он не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от цели удара.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 MP. If they move until the end of their turn, they will not provoke an attack of opportunity from the target.

traits.locale_text: При атаке щитом восстанавливается 2 МП. Атакованый щитом юнит не нанесет атаку по возможности если от него отойти

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, başarıyla {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} yaptığında +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} geri kazanır. Hareket ederse o hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, başarıyla {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} yaptığında +2 HP geri kazanır. Hareket ederse o hedefin fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu etki, turunun sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador use {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} con éxito, recupera +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Si se mueve, no provocará {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} del objetivo hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador use {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} con éxito, recupera +2 PM. Si se mueve, no provocará ataques de oportunidad del objetivo hasta el final de su turno.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}命中目标时，都会恢复2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。除此之外，装备者的移动不会触发目标{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，效果持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}命中目标时，都会恢复2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。除此之外，装备者的移动不会触发目标{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，效果持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
每当装备者使用{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}命中目标时，都会恢复2点移动点数。除此之外，装备者的移动不会触发目标借机攻击，效果持续至装备者回合结束。
每当装备者使用{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}命中目标时，都会恢复2点移动点数。除此之外，装备者的移动不会触发目标借机攻击，效果持续至装备者回合结束。

languages.text: L'utilisateur récupère +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à chaque utilisation réussie de {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Coup de bouclier{/g}. S'il se déplace, il ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part de la cible jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur récupère +2 PD à chaque utilisation réussie de {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Coup de bouclier{/g}. S'il se déplace, il ne provoque pas d'attaques d'opportunité de la part de la cible jusqu'à la fin de son tour.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}に成功すると、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+2を付与される。移動した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了までターゲットからの{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}に成功すると、MP+2を付与される。移動した場合、ターンの終了までターゲットからの機会攻撃を引き起こさない。
使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}に成功すると、MP+2を付与される。移動した場合、ターンの終了までターゲットからの機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger erfolgreich {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g} einsetzt, regeneriert er +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Wenn er sich bewegt, provoziert er bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} durch das Ziel.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder successfully uses {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If they move, they will not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the target until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger erfolgreich {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g} einsetzt, regeneriert er +2 BP. Wenn er sich bewegt, provoziert er bis zum Ende seines Zugs keine Gelegenheitsangriffe durch das Ziel.
